author: gstein
msg: look for gethostname in an existing -lnsl rather than bringing it in a
second time. simplify the search for crypt() a bit.

author: gstein
msg: the thread-specific CFLAGS were not getting propagated into THREAD_CFLAGS
properly (on the first-time config). on the second config, it would pull it

author: gstein
msg: Simplify the configuration mechanisms for threading in APR.
Revise how Apache configs APR and allow MPMs (or other config scripts) to
pass cmd line params down to APR. For the MPMs that specifically require
or disallow threads, have them force APR threads on/off.

author: trawick
msg: Make 2nd parm of apr_connect() const char * instead of char *.
Note to BeOS fans: apr_connect() is missing a check for hostname != NULL.
